item.title: Here’s How Gold Is Performing Ahead Of Fed Rate Decision Tomorrow
item.description: Gold prices advanced on Tuesday morning ahead of the Fed's rate decision on Wednesday, amidst a widely anticipated 25-basis-point rate cut.
